Your Global Partner in Construction & Industrial Solutions

Trafalgar Trading Pte Ltd excels in delivering construction materials, printing machinery, and infrastructure project management, with a global presence spanning inbound markets like UAE, Mauritius, Hong Kong, and Singapore, and outbound markets including China, India, Italy, Portugal, and the United Kingdom.

Our Product Range

Delivering premium construction materials, advanced printing solutions, and expert consultancy services for infrastructure projects.

Screw Systems & Components

Twin Screw Solutions

Advanced twin screw systems designed for optimal performance in plastic extrusion and compounding processes. Our solutions offer superior mixing capabilities and precise control over material processing.

Core Components
  • Twin screw elements for conveying (40mm-135mm)
  • Barrel segments with bimetallic liners
  • High-torque gearbox systems
  • Degassing units with vacuum ports

Processing Capacity: 100-2000 kg/h

Temperature Range: Up to 400°C

Single Screw Systems

High-performance single screw extruders equipped with advanced drive systems and precise temperature control. Ideal for continuous production processes.

Available Components
  • Complete screw sets (30mm-150mm)
  • AC/DC motor drives (5-250 kW)
  • Hardened gear transmissions
  • Thrust bearing assemblies

Drive Power: 5-250 kW

Speed Range: 0-200 RPM

Processing Equipment

Comprehensive range of processing equipment designed for material transformation and finishing operations. Features precision-engineered components for consistent output.

Equipment Range
  • Pelletizer dies (standard/custom)
  • Tungsten carbide cutting blades
  • Gravimetric feeders (0.5-1000 kg/h)
  • Water bath cooling systems

Pelletizing Capacity: Up to 5000 kg/h

Cutting Speed: 500-3000 RPM

Support Equipment & Peripherals

Support Equipment

Essential support equipment and structural components designed to enhance the functionality and stability of your production systems.

Key Components
  • Steel frames
  • Mounting systems
  • Support structures
  • Material handling systems

Additional Features: Cooling systems, Auxiliary equipment

Spare Parts

Comprehensive range of spare parts and maintenance kits to ensure optimal performance and longevity of your equipment.

Available Components
  • Replacement components
  • Wear parts
  • Maintenance kits

Compatibility: Designed for various equipment models

Quality: OEM-grade components
